domains.Name: Software Solutions
domains.Description: Skilled in designing, developing, and implementing customized software solutions to improve business processes and enhance customer experiences.

domains.Name: Business Administration
domains.Description: Experienced in managing business operations and resources to achieve growth and profitability. Knowledgeable about organizational structures, financial management, and human resources.

domains.Name: Global Mobility
domains.Description: Skilled in managing the relocation of employees between countries, including visa and immigration requirements and cross-cultural training.

domains.Name: HR Analytics
domains.Description: Knowledgeable in utilizing data analysis and advanced HR analytics to inform and optimize HR strategies and initiatives.

domains.Name: Financial Software
domains.Description: Skilled in developing, implementing, and using software applications for financial analysis, accounting, and reporting.
